borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 14.2pt; line-height: normal;">Prior to commencement of the
development, a Construction Logistic Plan (CLP) in line with the TfL guidelines
shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Council. The details shall
include the numbers, size and routes of construction vehicles, provisions
within/around the site to ensure that all vehicles associated with the
construction works are properly managed to prevent any unwanted disruption to
other highway users, and other matters relating to traffic management to be
agreed with the licencing officers of the council. Approved details shall be
implemented throughout the project period and any changes to the document must
be reported back to the council’s planning and highways department. <font face="Times New Roman, serif"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></font></p><p>

</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:14.2pt;line-height:normal"><br></p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a two storey front extension and a first floor side and rear extension to facilitate conversion of existing dwelling into two dwellings (2x 3 bedroom)

constraints_details.result: 2 Bull Lane, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM10 7HA
